preparation.subphrase: It feels terrible, but it is not dangerous.

preparation.text: Your body activated its alarm system.
preparation.subphrase: It will turn off on its own.

confrontation.subphrase: Breathe in slowly through your nose.

confrontation.text: You have survived every panic attack before this one.

confrontation.subphrase: Now breathe out slowly through your mouth.

reinforcement.text: Each time you face this, it gets a little easier.
You got through it. Remember this feeling of control.
